title: Frank Shushok Jr. named next president of Roanoke College - Virginia Tech Daily
content: Frank Shushok Jr. named next president of Roanoke College  Virginia Tech Daily
description: Shushok, who has served as vice president for student affairs since April 2020, has led a division known for investing heavily in deepening and expanding student well-being and its support services. Prior to his role as vice president, Shushok served a decade as associate and senior associate vice president.
